name: Facebook Messenger Dark and Collapse
description: Here are dark theme for Messenger which is also included in Facebook. I still working on these styles and in future I make some updates. Be in touch please :), I will listen for you advices.
additional_info:
Version 1.0
[07.03.2017]

+ contact list collapse
+ dark color for messenger
+ dark emoji menu
+ dark facebook navbar

Version 1.1
[09.03.2017]

+ font color in information section
+ font color for URLs in chat
+ font color in search section
+ left menu on hover overlays on chat

Version 1.2
[21.03.2017]

+ compatibility with Chrome
+ styled Polling
+ styled GIF section
+ styled "Write new message" page

Version 1.3
[23.03.2017]

+ fixed search field in messenger

Version 1.4
[29.03.2017]

+ added animation for colapsing the contact list
+ border around user photo of an unread message


Version 1.5
[12.01.2018]

+ styled game menu
+ styled url in messeges
+ styled pop-ups
+ styled events
+ styled polls
